text: was a Japanese daimyō of the Edo period, who ruled Hiroshima Domain. His childhood name was Sadakichi (定吉) later become Sadanosuke (定之丞) later become Zenjirō (善次郎). He was succeeded by his cousin Asano Nagamichi (1812-1872), grandson of Asano Shigeakira (1743-1814), 7th Lord of Hiroshima Domain. ==Family== * Father: Asano Naritaka * Wife: Tokugawa Toshihime, daughter of Tokugawa Naritaka of Owari Domain (and son of the 11th shōgun Tokugawa Ienari) == References == Category:1836 births Category:1858 deaths Category:Daimyo Category:Asano clan
title: Asano Yoshiteru
